title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your workshop, invoices, and preferences

readOnly.banner: You have view-only access to settings. Contact an admin to make changes.

account.profileDescription: Update your display name and email address.
account.name: Name
account.changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and choose a new one.
account.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
account.twoFactorDisablePrompt: Enter your password to disable two-factor authentication.
account.twoFactorEnablePrompt: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication with an authenticator app.
account.setupDialogDescription: Enter your password to begin setting up 2FA with an authenticator app.
account.scanQRDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
account.verifyCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to verify it's set up correctly.
account.enterCodeError: Please enter the code from your authenticator app
account.backupCodesDescription: Save these codes in a safe place. You can use them to sign in if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
account.deleteContentDescription: Selectively delete organization data such as vehicles, customers, quotes, or inventory. Your account and settings will remain intact.
account.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data including vehicles, service records, work orders, invoices, customers, files, and payments. This action cannot be undone.
account.deleteAccountDialogDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all data associated with it. This action is irreversible. All your vehicles, service records, work orders, quotes, customers, files, and payment history will be permanently removed.
account.deleteContentDialogDescription: Select the content you want to permanently delete. This action cannot be undone.
account.contentVehiclesDescription: All vehicles and their service records, notes, reminders, fuel logs, and recurring invoices
account.contentCustomersDescription: All customer records. Vehicles linked to deleted customers will be unlinked.
account.contentQuotesDescription: All quotes and their line items
account.contentInventoryDescription: All inventory parts and their images
account.contentDeleted: Selected content has been permanently deleted

team.title: Team
team.noOrgDescription: Create a team to share data with other users.
team.orgDescription: Manage your organization members and their roles.
team.createOrgDescription: Create an organization to invite team members. You will be the owner.
team.userNotFoundDescription: No account found for "{email}". Send them an invitation email to sign up and join your team?
team.invitationSentDescription: An invitation email has been sent to {email}.
team.cancelInvitationDescription: Cancel the invitation to {email}? They will no longer be able to use this link to join.
team.fullAdminAccess: Full admin access (bypasses all permission checks)
team.deleteRoleDescription: Delete the "{name}" role? Members with this role will lose their custom permissions.
team.noCustomRoles: No custom roles yet. Create one to define granular permissions for team members.
team.ownerDescription: Full access. Can manage members, change roles, and delete the organization.
team.adminDescription: Can invite/remove members and manage shared data.
team.memberDescription: Permissions determined by assigned custom role. No custom role means read-only access.
team.removeMemberDescription: Remove {name} from the team? They will lose access to shared data.

invoice.title: Invoice Layout
invoice.description: Configure what appears on generated PDF invoices.
invoice.invoiceNumberFormatHint: Use {year} for the current year. Preview: {preview}
invoice.nextInvoiceNumberHint: Next invoice will use this number (e.g. {example})
invoice.dueDaysHint: Number of days until invoice is due
invoice.companyLogoHint: Display company logo in invoice header
invoice.companyNameHint: Display company name text in invoice header
invoice.bankAccountHint: Show bank account / IBAN on invoice
invoice.organizationNumberHint: Show org number on invoice header
invoice.footerHint: This text appears at the bottom of every invoice

templates.title: Templates
templates.invoiceDescription: Customize the appearance of your PDF invoices and quotes.
templates.inspectionsDescription: Manage inspection checklists and multi-point templates.
templates.smsDescription: Customize the SMS messages sent to customers.
templates.smsTemplatesDescription: Customize the text messages sent to customers. Use variables like {companyName} to insert dynamic values.
templates.invoiceReadyDescription: Sent when sharing an invoice with a customer.
templates.quoteReadyDescription: Sent when sharing a quote with a customer.
templates.inspectionReadyDescription: Sent when sharing an inspection report with a customer.
templates.statusInProgressDescription: Sent when a work order status changes to In Progress.
templates.statusWaitingPartsDescription: Sent when a work order status changes to Waiting for Parts.
templates.statusReadyDescription: Sent when a work order status changes to Ready.
templates.statusCompletedDescription: Sent when a work order status changes to Completed.
templates.paymentReceivedDescription: Sent when a payment is recorded for an invoice.

smsDefaults.invoiceReady: Your invoice is ready. View it here: {share_link}
smsDefaults.quoteReady: Your quote is ready for review. View it here: {share_link}
smsDefaults.inspectionReady: Your vehicle inspection report is ready. View it here: {share_link}
smsDefaults.statusInProgress: Work has started on your vehicle. We'll keep you updated.
smsDefaults.statusWaitingParts: Your vehicle is waiting for parts. We'll notify you when work resumes.
smsDefaults.statusReady: Your vehicle is ready for pickup!
smsDefaults.statusCompleted: Your service is complete. Thank you for your business!
smsDefaults.paymentReceived: Payment of {amount} received for invoice {invoice_number}. Thank you!

payment.detailsDescription: Bank account and payment terms shown on invoices.
payment.bankAccountHint: Your bank account number or IBAN for receiving payments
payment.paymentTermsHint: Payment terms text displayed on invoices (e.g. "Net 14 days", "Due on receipt")
payment.onlinePaymentsDescription: Allow customers to pay invoices online via shared invoice links.
payment.stripeWebhookHint: Add this URL in your Stripe Dashboard under Webhooks. Subscribe to checkout.session.completed.
payment.termsOfSaleDescription: Required by Vipps. Customers can view these from the invoice page.
payment.externalTermsUrlHint: Link to an external page with your terms. If set, the invoice will link here instead of the built-in terms page.
payment.publicTermsUrlHint: Share this URL with Vipps or link it from your website.
payment.paypalWebhookHint: Add this URL in your PayPal Developer Dashboard under Webhooks. Subscribe to PAYMENT.CAPTURE.COMPLETED.

currency.title: Currency & Tax
currency.description: Default currency and tax rate used across invoices and service records.
currency.enableTaxHint: Show tax calculation on invoices and service records
currency.defaultTaxRateHint: Auto-populated when creating new service records

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Define custom fields that appear on service records and quotes.
customFields.emptyState: No custom fields defined yet. Click "Add Field" to create one.
customFields.label: Label
customFields.fieldNameHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.
customFields.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete "{label}" and all its saved values. This cannot be undone.

workshop.title: Workshop Defaults
workshop.description: Default values used when creating new service records.
workshop.unitsDescription: Choose between metric (km, liters) and imperial (miles, gallons) units.

maintenance.title: Predicted Maintenance
maintenance.description: Predict each vehicle's current mileage from its service history and surface vehicles that are due or approaching their next service.
maintenance.enablePredictedHint: Show predictions on vehicle details and dashboard
maintenance.approachingThresholdHint: Show warning when within this distance of next service

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize how Torqvoice looks and feels.
appearance.darkModeHint: Switch between light and dark themes
appearance.dateTimeDescription: Configure how dates and times are displayed across the application.
appearance.timezoneHint: When set to auto-detect, each user sees dates in their browser's timezone.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Export your data as a backup or import a previously exported file.
data.exportDescription: Download your data as a zip file. Select which categories to include in the backup.
data.optSettingsDesc: Workshop info, invoice config, payment providers
data.optVehiclesDesc: Vehicles, notes, fuel logs, reminders, service records
data.filesWarning: Includes uploaded files — backup may be larger
data.exportCompleteMessage: Your backup file has been downloaded.
data.exportFailedMessage: Could not export your data. Please try again.
data.importWarning: Importing will <bold>replace all existing data</bold> with the contents of the backup file. This action cannot be undone.
data.importCompleteMessage: All data has been restored from the backup file.
data.importFromOtherDescription: Migrate your data from another platform. Select a service to get started.
data.lubelogExportSteps: How to export your LubeLog data:
data.lubelogStep3: Click <bold>Make Backup</bold> to download a zip file
data.lubelogStep4: Upload the downloaded zip file below
data.lubelogAddNote: This will <bold>add data alongside</bold> your existing records — nothing will be deleted.
data.invoiceNinjaExportSteps: How to export your Invoice Ninja data:
data.invoiceNinjaStep3: Click <bold>Export</bold> to download a zip file
data.invoiceNinjaStep4: Upload the downloaded zip file below
data.invoiceNinjaAddNote: This will <bold>add data alongside</bold> your existing records — nothing will be deleted.
data.invoiceNinjaFileHint: Upload an Invoice Ninja zip export file. Files up to 200MB supported.

license.title: White-Label License
license.description: Activate a white-label license to remove Torqvoice branding from invoices and the application.
license.keyHint: Each license key is tied to this organization and cannot be shared across multiple organizations.

about.title: About Torqvoice
about.description: Torqvoice is your complete vehicle service management solution. Track service history, repairs and more.
